comment: Who is sick of all the jewish haters wanna-be Nazis, whose claims are shallow, based in no facts, & need to read their Bibles/History Books....to actually learn a thing called the TRUTH....?
amr:
# ::snt Who is sick of all the jewish haters wanna-be Nazis, whose claims are shallow, based in no facts, & need to read their Bibles/History Books....to actually learn a thing called the TRUTH....?
(s / sick-04
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (h / hate-01
                  :ARG1 (r / religious-group
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Jew")))
            :mod (a / all)
            :ARG0-of (c / claim-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / shallow)
                  :domain-of s2)
            :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                  :ARG2 (f / fact
                        :polarity -)))
      :ARG0-of (n2 / need-01
            :ARG1 (r2 / read-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (s3 / slash
                        :op1 (b2 / book
                              :mod r
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Bible")))
                  :op2 (b3 / book
                        :mod (h2 / history)))
            :purpose (l / learn-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (t2 / true-01))
                  :ARG1-of (a2 / actual-02)))
      :ARG1 (a3 / amr-unknown))

comment: Stop the racist and sexual preference remarks!
amr:

(s / stop-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (r / remark-01
            :ARG1 (p / prefer-01
                  :manner (a / and
                        :op1 (r2 / racist)
                        :op2 (s2 / sex)))))

comment: Racist and homophobic slurs are unwelcome and reflect poorly on yourself. Please refrain so that all can comment
amr:
# ::snt Racist and homophobic slurs are unwelcome and reflect poorly on yourself. Please refrain so that all can comment
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (w / welcome-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (s / slur
                        :mod (a2 / and
                              :op1 (r / racist)
                              :op2 (h / homophobia))))
            :op2 (r2 / reflect-01
                  :ARG1 s
                  :ARG2 (y / you)
                  :manner (p / poor)))
      :snt2 (r3 / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :purpose (p2 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (c / comment-01
                        :ARG0 (a3 / all)))))

comment: The word Nigger attacks one based on their race while faggot attacks a person's sexual orientation.
amr:
# ::snt The word Nigger attacks one based on their race while faggot attacks a person's sexual orientation.
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (a / attack-01
            :ARG0 (w / word
                  :mod (s / string-entity
                        :value "Nigger"))
            :ARG1 (o / one)
            :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                  :ARG2 (r / race
                        :poss o)))
      :ARG2 (a2 / attack-01
            :ARG0 (f / faggot)
            :ARG1 (o2 / orient-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person)
                  :ARG2 (s2 / sex))))
